def string_case(s, k):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(s, k))

def string_case(s, k):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].upper() + s[k:]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    k = int(input())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(s, k))

def string_case(k, s):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(k, s))
n, k = map(int, input().split())
s = input()
print(s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:]) 


def string_case(s, k):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:].lower()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    k = int(input())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(s, k))

n, k = map(int, input().split())
s = input()


print(s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:])


def string_case(n, k, s):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(s, k))


def string_case(n, k, s):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(n, k, s))
